title: (x) Gerrit Noordzij – Kind und Schrift typeface - Sudum (unpublished) {Pieter}
content:
what is the typeface:

in the pdf document it says 'Caslon Buch, Fotosatz' [http://www.letterror.com/noordzij/stuff/Kind%20und%20Schrift.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141803/http:/www.letterror.com/noordzij/stuff/Kind%20und%20Schrift.pdf "http://www.letterror.com/noordzij/stuff/Kind%20und%20Schrift.pdf")  
in pdf \> fonts it says 'SuduX050–Roman'

where can one buy it from

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gn.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141803/http:/typophile.com/files/gn.jpg) | 30.42 KB |
author: splinter

comments.content: It could be one of the fonts Gerrit Noordzij has created for his own use. His son Peter Mathias is the founder of The Enschedé Type Foundry ( [http://www.teff.nl/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141803/http:/www.teff.nl/index.html "http://www.teff.nl/index.html")) and as far as I know they are going to publish some of these fonts. Ruse is one that's available now (but not similar to your sample).

The typeface is called Sudum and is done by Gerrit Noordzij and as yet unpublished.  
Pieter

It has the gorgeous mark of Gerrit's hand.

Héctor
